Package ohos.aafwk.ability.delegation

Interface IAbilityMonitor


  • public interface IAbilityMonitor
    Provides methods for matching monitored Ability objects that meet specified conditions. The most recently matched Ability objects will be saved in the IAbilityMonitor object.

    You can call IAbilityDelegator#addAbilityMonitor(String) to add the Ability objects to be monitored and then use methods provided in IAbilityMonitor to obtain the monitored Ability objects when newAbility objects are started or the lifecycle states of monitored abilities have changed.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Ability waitForAbility​()
      Waits for and returns the state-changing Ability object that matches the conditions specified in this monitor within 5 seconds.
      Ability waitForAbility​(long timeoutMillisecond)
      Waits for and returns the state-changing Ability object that matches the conditions specified in this monitor within the specified time.

    • Method Detail

      • waitForAbility

        Ability waitForAbility​(long timeoutMillisecond)
        Waits for and returns the state-changing Ability object that matches the conditions specified in this monitor within the specified time.

        The current thread will be blocked until the timer specified by timeoutMillisecond expires.

        Parameters:
        timeoutMillisecond - Indicates the maximum amount of time to wait, in milliseconds. The value must be a positive integer.
        Returns:
        Returns the Ability object if any object whose lifecycle state has changed is matched within the specified time; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • waitForAbility

        Ability waitForAbility​()
        Waits for and returns the state-changing Ability object that matches the conditions specified in this monitor within 5 seconds.

        The current thread will be blocked until the 5-second default timer expires.

        Returns:
        Returns the Ability object if any object whose lifecycle state has changed is matched within 5 seconds; returns null otherwise.
        Since:
        3
